scripts.deploy:mainnet: graph deploy protocol-mainnet --network mainnet --version-label $(grep VERSION_LABEL .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --node https://subgraphs.alchemy.com/api/subgraphs/deploy --deploy-key $(grep DEPLOY_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2)
scripts.deploy:sepolia: graph deploy protocol-sepolia --network sepolia --version-label $(grep VERSION_LABEL .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --node https://subgraphs.alchemy.com/api/subgraphs/deploy --deploy-key $(grep DEPLOY_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2)
